A dashboard website for displaying regulatory policies
Data visualization capabilities for complex regulatory policies
Ability to analyze policies with related data and charts
Frontend that fetches all data from backend APIs
Backend that connects to an external PostgreSQL database
Use of specified environment variables for database connection: DB_HOST=localhost, DB_PORT=5432, DB_USERNAME=myappuser, DB_PASSWORD=myapppassword, DB_NAME=myapp
Lavender background color assigned to the website
Indigo color assigned to UI elements
Configuration of package.json with 'npm run install:all' script to install both frontend and backend dependencies
Configuration of package.json with 'npm run dev' script to start both frontend and backend concurrently
Interactive charts and graphs for policy data representation
Responsive design compatible with multiple device sizes
